resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81562</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81562</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4993</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Exclusion Game</string>
            <string language="es">El juego de exclusión</string>
            <string language="ga">Cluiche Eisiachta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ausschluss-Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Jeu d'Exclusion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Jogo Da Exclusão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Gioco Di Esclusione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι αποκλεισμού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The class is divided into three groups (1) The Excluded (2) The Slaves (3) The Bosses. They act out the instructions given and the feelings engendered by the roles played are then discussed and applied to life in Ireland.</string>
            <string language="es">La clase se divide en tres grupos: (1) los marginados, (2) los esclavos, (3) los jefes.  Actúan de acuerdo a las instrucciones que se les hayan dado y exponen los sentimientos que les han creado los papeles que han representado. Después se aplican a la vi</string>
            <string language="ga">Roinntear an rang ina trí ghrúpa (1) na hEisiachtaí (2) na Sclábhaithe (3) na Daoine Ceannais. Cuireann siad i ngníomh na horduithe a thugtar dóibh agus ansin pléitear na mothúcháin a d’airigh siad sna róil agus cuirtear i bhfeidhm ar shaol na hÉireann ia</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kategorie wird in drei (1) Gruppen (2) die 
Sklaven ausgeschlossen (3) die Chefs geteilt. Sie fungieren aus 
den Anweisungen, die erteilt werden und die Gefühle, die durch die 
gespielten Rollen erzeugt werden, werden dann am Leben in Irland 
behandelt und angewendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La classe est divisée en trois groupes de (1) 
exclu (2) les esclaves (3) les patrons. Ils agissent hors des 
instructions données et les sentiments engendrés par les rôles 
joués sont alors discutés et appliqués à la vie en Irlande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A classe é dividida em três grupos de (1) 
excluído (2) os escravos (3) as saliências. Agem para fora das
instruções dadas e os sentimentos engendered pelos papéis jogados 
então são discutidos e aplicados à vida em Ireland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il codice categoria è diviso in tre gruppi di (1)
escluso (2) gli schiavi (3) le sporgenze. Si comportano verso 
l'esterno le istruzioni date e le sensibilità generate dai ruoli 
svolti allora sono discusse ed applicate a vita in Irlanda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλάση διαιρείται σε τρεις ομάδες (1) αποκλειμένος 
(2) οι σκλάβοι (3) οι προϊστάμενοι. Ενεργούν έξω οι 
οδηγίες που δίνονται και τα συναισθήματα που προκαλούνται από 
τους ρόλους που διαδραματίζονται συζητούνται έπειτα και 
εφαρμόζονται στη ζωή στην Ιρλανδία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
